TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GestureRecognitionResult extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains information about an ink gesture.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult>包含<xref:System.Windows.Ink.ApplicationGesture>和的可能性大小，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>正确识别笔势。
使用<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognitionResult.RecognitionConfidence%2A>属性来确定的可能性大小，<xref:System.Windows.Ink.GestureRecognizer>正确识别笔势。
## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在识别手势<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>。 此示例假定有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>调用`inkCanvas1`且其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas.Gesture>事件已连接到代码中的事件处理程序。
[!code-csharp[GestureSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#1)] [!code-vb[GestureSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GestureSample/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ApplicationGesture As ApplicationGesture
public: property System::Windows::Ink::ApplicationGesture ApplicationGesture { System::Windows::Ink::ApplicationGesture get(); };

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RecognitionConfidence As RecognitionConfidence

Docs.summary: Gets the level of confidence that the has in the recognition of the gesture.
